lead_paragraph: The recalls, which cover the United States and Canada, involve seven million tricycles and more than a million high chairs as well as other products.
snippet: The recalls, which cover the United States and Canada, involve seven million tricycles and more than a million high chairs as well as other products.

headline.seo: Fisher-Price Recalls 11 Million Items Over Safety Concerns
headline.print_headline: Fisher-Price Recalls Items Numbering In Millions
